item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurants bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: The Hot Club on S. Water St. (this is the area with a few bars across from Narragansett Electric and infront of the hurricane barrier on the water.) THE HOT CLUB!!! Okay, so its a notorious Providence institution and its the end of Memorial Day Weekend.....but what better way to spend the end of a (hopefully) glorious, beautiful, sunny summer kick-off weekend than winding down and hanging out with friends on the deck overlooking the water and the Providence skyline! Its official, we've done this 3 YEARS in a row and its worth repeating, so let's check it out!

Hope to see you there! Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing some kind of scarf (or jacket), but we're hard to miss - look for us on the outside deck!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - The Hot Club!
